alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 18 at 2:07PM HST until February 18 at 4:15PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM HST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... At 207 PM HST, radar indicated that heavy rainfall has been easing over Kauai, but Hanalei River and South Fork Wailua River still had high flow levels. The Kauai Emergency Management Agency reported that Maalo Road was closed due to flooding and multiple stalled vehicles. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flooding in drainages, streams, rivers, roads, properties, and other low-lying areas. Public road closures possible in some areas. Landslides are possible in steep terrain. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lihue, Kapaa, Kalaheo, Princeville, Kilauea, North Fork Wailua Trails, Wailua Homesteads, Hanalei, Wailua, Lawai, Wainiha, Koloa, Haena, Kokee State Park, Anahola, Poipu, Hanapepe, and Na Pali State Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Do not cross fast flowing or rising water in your vehicle, or on foot. Turn around, don`t drown. Stay away from streams, rivers, drainage ditches, and culverts, even if they are currently dry.
